title: Secretary information,  PIO extend condolences
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 13 (APP): Federal Information and Broadcasting Secretary Shahera Shahid and Principal Information Officer Mubashir Hassan on Saturday expressed their grief and sorrow over the death of the mother of senior journalists Aon Sahi and Nokhaiz Sahi.
Federal Secretary Information and PIO expressed heartfelt sympathy and condolences to the family of the deceased.
Shahera Shahid said she was deeply saddened to hear the news of the death of the mother Aon Sahi and Nokhaiz Sahi.
She said the demise of a mother was a great tragedy.
The secretary information and PIO said that they stood with the bereaved family in this hour of grief.
They prayed to Allah Almighty to rest the departed soul in eternal peace and grant courage to the bereaved family to bear this loss with fortitude.
